attributes.action: Third Party Prescriptions for ileostomy bags
attributes.additional_details:
I want the government to retract recent recommendations for Doctors to Ignore Third Party Organisation Prescription Orders for Ileostomy and Colostomy Bags.

Third Party Organisations act as a useful advice network and support for Crohns and Colitis suffers and can have prescriptions sent straight to the patients door within 48 hours.
